segments.text: I can't help but feel a sense of impending doom in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the two-step stool is in a very precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is visibly tilted and looks like it could go any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll surely fall, probably onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor itself is getting increasingly slippery from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in the puddle, completely oblivious to this hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip and hurt themselves badly here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash of dishes if the boy falls, or if the woman loses her balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for multiple minor accidents, or even a serious one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside contrasts so sharply with the internal tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning, but I can't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making my heart race with anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all come out of this without a scratch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of potential injuries is quite unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR
